sentences.en: Don't be startled by the smiling, white - haired man who croon " Merry Christmas " to you.
sentences.cn: 当你见到那向你低声哼着 “ 圣诞快乐 ” 面带笑容的白发老人时,不要感到吃惊.

sentences.en: He would much rather have been crooning in a smoky bar.
sentences.cn: 他宁愿是在充满烟气的酒吧里低声哼唱。

sentences.en: Later in the evening, Lewis began to croon another Springsteen song.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上晚些时候，刘易斯开始哼唱另一首斯普林斯汀的歌曲。
歌声柔和醇厚的西纳特拉

trans.tran_cn: 低声歌唱, 低声哼, 低吟
trans.tran_en: If you croon, you sing or hum quietly and gently

trans.tran_cn: 低声歌唱，柔情地轻哼﹑轻唱或低声述说，深情地唱
